what.title: What is this?
what.p1: An interactive web visualiser for a Q-learning RL agent that plays Snake.
what.p2: Set your own hyperparameters and see how the algorithm performs.

how.title: How do I use this?
how.p1: Just set the parameters below and hit Train.
how.p2: Vary the speed and click Test to see how the AI plays after training.
how.p3: Explanation of each parameter and the code for this project is available on

agentSee.title: What does the agent see?
agentSee.p1: Hover over the boxes present below for the exact details of the state representation.

state.tooltip1: The presence of immediate danger (either a wall or the snake body itself) one step ahead in all four directions. There could be danger in multiple directions at the same time, so 4 directions -> 16 possible combinations.
state.tooltip2: The relative position of the apple with respect to the snake. This has 7 possible values: Bottom Left, Left, Top Left, Up and so on.
